summary: Mike requests to re-run Sprint 1 but limited to only the login step (US-010). The SPRINT_PLANNING_ARCHITECT analyzes the request, confirms feasibility, and proposes a focused sprint plan for standalone execution of US-010, seeking approval to proceed.

decisions.title: Focus re-run on login step only
decisions.details: Re-execute Sprint SP-001 narrowly to US-010 Mock Login Page, skipping US-001 and US-015 to avoid redundancy and keep it lightweight.

actions.task: Proceed with re-running SP-001 (login-only) upon client approval

backlog_deltas.title: Re-run sprint narrowed to only US-010 Mock Login Page
